Aegis Shield Generator.name: 神盾護盾產生器
Aegis Shield Generator.detail:
擺放三顆 d6 骰來表示這個護盾產生器的剩餘能源。當任何至少有一部分位於該區域內的角色或物件受到傷害時，你能以反應擲其中一顆 d6 來使該傷害減少等同擲骰結果的數值。

這個效果會持續直到該場景結束，所有骰子都被消耗導致護盾產生器失去動力、或護盾產生器被毀為止。

Armor Pack.name: Armor Pack
Armor Pack.detail: When finished, this pack latches onto the next allied character that moves adjacent to it and fuses onto them. The project is destroyed, but they gain +1 ARMOR for the rest of the scene. This could temporarily put them over the armor maximum.

Assassin Drone.name: 刺客無人機
Assassin Drone.detail:
在展開後，刺客無人機會瞄準一處由你選擇，位於感應和視線範圍內的 濺射 2 範圍區域，且你得到區域拒止反應（每輪不限定觸發次數）。

你能以快速動作把刺客無人機回收或重新展開在其他位置。直到被回收或摧毀之前，它將維持展開直到該場景結束為止。

Area Denial.name: 區域拒止
Area Denial.trigger: 當敵對角色在你刺客無人機瞄準的區域內開始移動、或移動進入該區域時。
Area Denial.detail: 你能使用刺客無人機對目標進行遠距攻擊，該攻擊判定得到你的毅力加值，並在命中時造成 3 動能傷害。

Autoloader Drone.name: Autoloader Drone
Autoloader Drone.detail: 1/round, one character adjacent to it may reload a Loading weapon as a quick action. It deactivates at the end of the scene.

Bouncing Mine.name: Bouncing Mine
Bouncing Mine.detail: This mine detonates when a flying character passes over or adjacent to it, up to 10 spaces high. The mine launches itself upwards and detonates: all characters within the affected area must succeed on a Systems save or take 2d6 explosive damage and immediately land (this counts as falling without any damage); additionally, they can’t fly until the end of their next turn. On a success, they take half damage and are otherwise unaffected.

Breaching Charge.name: 突破炸藥
Breaching Charge.detail: 除了鄰接的未佔據空間外，這個地雷也可以被安裝在鄰接的牆壁、掩護、或地形上。在設置後，這個地雷必須以快速動作來引爆。影響範圍內的角色必須成功通過敏捷豁免，否則受到 2d6 穿甲(AP)爆炸傷害。豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。物件和地形會被自動命中並受到 30 穿甲(AP)爆炸傷害。

Damping Station.name: Damping Station
Damping Station.detail: When finished, this repair station generates a Burst 1 field within which allied characters gain IMMUNITY to burn and clear any burn currently affecting them.

Deployable Shield (Reserve).name: Deployable Shield (Reserve)
Deployable Shield (Reserve).detail: Grants soft cover to all friendly characters in a BURST 2 radius

Emplacement.name: Emplacement
Emplacement.detail: When finished, this elevated emplacement is SIZE 1 and 3 spaces high. The top third is a is a shielded platform that can fit characters up to a combined SIZE 1 (the rest is solid metal or plastic). Firing slits allow line of sight both into and out of the emplacement but give characters within hard cover from all directions. Characters can enter or exit the emplacement from any adjacent space as a quick action. Upon entering, they move into the shielded platform. Characters and DEPLOYABLES can stand on the flat roof of the structure, but don’t gain cover.

Explosive Mine.name: 爆裂地雷
Explosive Mine.detail: 所有位於其 爆發 1 範圍內的角色必須成功通過敏捷豁免，否則受到 2d6 爆炸傷害。豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

Flash Mine.name: 閃光地雷
Flash Mine.detail: 這個地雷會在任何角色移動到它所在或與其鄰接的空間時引爆，產生一個 爆發 1 範圍的閃光區域。位於影響範圍內的角色必須成功通過敏捷豁免，否則視線範圍被縮減到只剩下其鄰接空間的距離，持續直到其下一回合結束為止。

Ghast Drone.name: 妖鬼無人機
Ghast Drone.detail:
妖鬼巢房能以免費動作在感應和視線範圍內的一個未佔據空間展開，並在該處成為一架靜止懸浮的無人機。在被展開後，你仍然能夠把它當成武器來進行交火或彈幕，但使用其所在的位置來計算視線範圍和射程。

你能以快速動作把妖鬼無人機回收或重新展開在其他位置。直到被回收或摧毀之前，它將維持展開直到該場景結束為止。如果它被毀，則它會遵循無人機被毀的規則，且直到被維修之前都無法再被使用。

Grounding Mine.name: Grounding Mine
Grounding Mine.detail: This mine must be detonated remotely as a quick action, affecting a single character within range 5 of the mine: they must succeed on a Hull save or be pulled as far as possible toward the mine and knocked Prone. Flying characters that fail the save are affected the same way, except they are also forced to land (this counts as falling but without damage).

HAVOK Mine.name: HAVOK Mine
HAVOK Mine.detail: When a character moves over or adjacent to this mine, it detonates with a focused explosion in a line 5 path in the direction of the character who triggered it. Characters within the affected area must succeed on an Agility save or take 4 burn. On a success, they take 2 burn.

Hive Drone.name: Hive Drone
Hive Drone.detail:
This hive drone can be deployed to a free space within Sensors and line of sight, where it releases a burst 2 greywash swarm with the following effects:
  • Allied characters at least partially within the affected area gain soft cover, as does the hive drone.
  • Hostile characters take 1 AP kinetic damage when they start their turn in the affected area or enter it for the first time in a round. Damage from areas created by multiple hive drones does not stack.
The drone can be deployed to a different space or recalled as a quick action.

ICEOUT Drone.name: 冷遇無人機
ICEOUT Drone.detail:
至少一部份處於冷遇無人機的 爆發 1 範圍區域的角色將免疫於所有科技動作的效果，且無法進行科技動作。因為科技動作而造成的既有狀況和效果不會因此被解除，但角色在處於該區域時將會對其免疫，並能如常進行豁免判定。

冷遇無人機能以快速動作被移動到感應範圍內的任意位置。它不能被回收，並會在該場景結束時失效。

Jericho Deployable Cover.name: 耶利哥展開掩體
Jericho Deployable Cover.detail: 你與你鄰接的兩個未佔據空間中展開兩個大小 1 的硬性掩護。每一個掩體都是 5 迴避 和 10 HP 的物件，且能各自被選為目標或被毀。這些掩體可以透過完整動作被撿起。

Lotus Projector.name: 蓮花投射器
Lotus Projector.detail:
這個偵查無人機可以在感應和視線範圍內的一個空間展開，並會在該處產生 爆發 2 範圍的區域，提供以下效果：
  • 你知道影響範圍內所有角色的當前位置、HP、迴避、電子防禦、和熱度。
  • 影響範圍內的敵對角色無法進行躲藏，且其如果在影響範圍內結束回合的話會失去匿跡狀態。
  • 敵對角色在影響範圍內期間將無法受益於隱形狀態。
你能以快速動作收回或重新展開你的偵查無人機。

Lurker Mine.name: Lurker Mine
Lurker Mine.detail: This mine does not detonate as normal. Instead, gain the Selective Detonation reaction, which can be performed once per deployed lurker mine.

Markey’s Fusebox.name: Markey’s Fusebox
Markey’s Fusebox.detail: Expend a charge to set an explosive charge in a free adjacent space. It arms at the end of the round; once armed, it explodes if it takes any damage or heat. Characters within Burst 3 must succeed on an AGILITY save or take 2d6 Explosive damage and be pushed out of the affected area, or as far as possible. On a success, they are still pushed but take half damage.

Mesmer Mine.name: 麥斯麥催眠地雷
Mesmer Mine.detail: 所有位於其 爆發 2 範圍內的角色必須成功通過系統豁免，否則陷入固定狀況，持續直到其下一回合結束為止。

Omnibus Plate.name: Omnibus Plate
Omnibus Plate.detail: The plate cannot be moved, is flat, and does not block movement. It is large enough to hold a single SIZE 1 or smaller DRONE or DEPLOYABLE at a time. DRONES and DEPLOYABLES placed on the plate gain RESISTANCE to all damage and gain +1 to the size of any BURST or BLAST effects they generate. Additionally, any of their effects that require adjacency can now be activated from within Range 2.

Guardian OROCHI Drone.name: 大蛇．護法無人機
Guardian OROCHI Drone.detail: 這個無人機會投放護盾。對與這個無人機鄰接的隊友角色進行的遠距攻擊會得到 +1 難度。

Hunter OROCHI Drone.name: 大蛇．獵手無人機
Hunter OROCHI Drone.detail: 當其他角色在與這個無人機鄰接時開始其回合，或在每輪第一次移動到與之鄰接的位置時，你能以反應強迫他進行系統豁免。若豁免失敗，則目標受到鎖定。

Shredder OROCHI Drone.name: 大蛇．碎裂無人機
Shredder OROCHI Drone.detail: 當其他角色在與這個無人機鄰接時開始其回合，或在每輪第一次移動到與之鄰接的位置時，你能以反應強迫他進行機體豁免。若豁免失敗，則目標受到 1 動能傷害，並陷入離散狀況直到其下一回合結束為止。

Snare OROCHI Drone.name: 大蛇．陷阱無人機
Snare OROCHI Drone.detail: 當其他角色在與這個無人機鄰接時開始其回合，或在每輪第一次移動到與之鄰接的位置時，你能以反應強迫他進行敏捷豁免。若豁免失敗，則目標陷入固定狀況。這個固定狀況會持續直到這個無人機被毀、不再與目標鄰接、或目標以快速動作成功通過敏捷豁免為止。

Perimeter Command Plate.name: 周界指揮板
Perimeter Command Plate.detail:
當角色在每輪中第一次進入指揮板佔據的空間、或在該處結束其回合時，指揮板就會被啟動。

在列印周界指揮板時，選擇以下其中一個設定：
  • 斥力：進入 PCP 的敵對角色必須成功通過機體豁免，否則被往你選擇的任意方向推動 3 格。如果這會使目標與障礙物相撞，則目標將因此被撞倒伏臥。進入 PCP 的隊友角色則能立即以免費動作往任意方向飛行 3 格。
  • 吸引：進入 PCP 的角色必須成功通過機體豁免，否則陷入固定狀況。目標能以快速動作重複進行這個豁免，成功則解除該狀況；這個固定狀況也會在 PCP 被毀時一併解除。

Portable Bunker.name: 流動碉堡
Portable Bunker.detail:
所有完全處於碉堡的 4x4 範圍區域內的角色，對於來自碉堡外的任何攻擊都會受益於硬性掩護，並對源自碉堡外的 濺射、線性、爆發和錐形攻擊造成的傷害具有抗性。

這座碉堡是露天的，且所有角色都能夠自由進出。一旦被展開，這座碉堡就不能被移動或回收。

Restock Drone.name: 補給無人機
Restock Drone.detail: 當隊友角色與這部無人機鄰接時，該角色能以快速動作將其啟動，清除 1d6 熱度，解除一個狀況，並裝填一件帶有裝填標籤的武器。在被啟動之後，這部無人機會立即解體。

Sentinel Drone.name: 哨兵無人機
Sentinel Drone.detail:
哨兵無人機可以在感應和視線範圍內的一個未佔據空間展開，並設立一個 爆發 2 範圍的警戒區域。位於範圍區域內的敵對角色會在進行任何攻擊之前，都會因為遭到無人機的炮火並受到 3 動能傷害。

你能以快速動作把哨兵無人機回收或重新展開在其他位置。

Smoke Mine.name: 煙霧地雷
Smoke Mine.detail: 這個地雷會在任何隊友角色移動到它所在或與其鄰接的空間時引爆。所有處於其 爆發 3 範圍內的角色和物件都會得到軟性掩護，持續直到將其引爆的角色的下一回合結束為止。

SMOKESTACK Heat Sink.name: SMOKESTACK Heat Sink
SMOKESTACK Heat Sink.detail: Expend a charge to deploy a pylon that absorbs heat in a Burst 2 area around itself. It absorbs any heat dealt to characters at least partially within the affected area from any source (before reductions, including RESISTANCE). Once the pylon has absorbed 6 Heat, it explodes. Characters within the affected area must succeed on an AGILITY save or take 1d6+3 AP Energy Damage. On a success, they take half damage. Objects and DEPLOYABLES are hit automatically. Any excess heat absorbed by the pylon as part of the same action or effect that caused it to explode disperses with no effect.

Snare Foam.name: Snare Foam
Snare Foam.detail: When finished, this project continually sprays foam around it, creating a Burst 2 area of difficult terrain. Destroying it removes the effect.

Stasis Barrier.name: Stasis Barrier
Stasis Barrier.detail:
Generate a line 4 barrier 4 spaces high in free spaces with at least one space adjacent to you. It counts as an obstruction and provides soft cover, but doesn’t block line of sight.
When an attack is made against a character that benefits from this barrier’s soft cover, roll 1d6: on 4+, the attack is consumed by the barrier and has no effect whatsoever. The barrier lasts for the rest of the scene, or until you deactivate it as a quick action. This effect does not stack with Invisible.

Tempest Drone.name: 暴風無人機
Tempest Drone.detail:
當角色在與暴風無人機鄰接時開始其回合、或在每輪第一次移動到其鄰接空間時，該角色必須成功通過機體豁免，否則受到 4 能量傷害，並被往遠離暴風無人機的方向擊退 3 格距離。

你能以快速動作把暴風無人機回收或重新展開在其他位置。直到被回收或摧毀之前，它將維持展開直到該場景結束為止。

Thermite Charge.name: 鋁熱炸彈
Thermite Charge.detail: 這枚炸彈必須以快速動作來遙控引爆。影響範圍內的所有角色必須成功通過工程豁免，否則受到 3 能量傷害。鋁熱炸彈會自動命中物件，並造成帶有穿甲（AP）效果的 10 能量傷害。

Detonate.name: 引爆
Detonate.detail: 影響範圍內的所有角色必須成功通過工程豁免，否則受到 3 能量傷害。鋁熱炸彈會自動命中物件，並造成帶有穿甲（AP）效果的 10 能量傷害。

Turret Drone.name: 無人炮塔
Turret Drone.detail: 得到炮塔攻擊反應，每展開一個無人炮塔就能使用這個反應一次。無人炮塔無法回收，且會在場景結束時停止運作。

Turret Attack.name: 炮塔攻擊
Turret Attack.trigger: 當無人炮塔的 ⌿10 範圍內有隊友角色進行攻擊並命中時。
Turret Attack.detail: 無人炮塔對在視線範圍內的目標造成 3 動能傷害。

Webjaw Snare.name: 網顎陷阱
Webjaw Snare.detail:
網顎陷阱不會阻礙移動，且直到被觸發前都不能被攻擊。
網顎陷阱會在任何角色移動到其所在位置時被觸發。目標必須成功通過機體豁免，否則受到 1d6 穿甲(AP)動能傷害，並陷入固定狀況。這個效果會持續直到網顎陷阱被毀為止。
